predictions.text: Euro area HICP flash year-over-year for September 2025 will be between 2.4% and 2.8%, per Eurostat release on 2025-09-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify using Eurostat’s “Euro area annual inflation – flash estimate” news release on 2025-09-30. Success if the published YoY HICP headline is within [2.4%, 2.8%].
predictions.rationale: Cooling producer prices and softer demand should cap headline inflation, while energy stabilizes.

predictions.text: University of Michigan 1-year inflation expectations (prelim) for September 2025 will be between 2.8% and 3.2%, reported on 2025-09-13.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify from University of Michigan Surveys of Consumers preliminary September release on 2025-09-13. Success if 1-year inflation expectations in report are within [2.8%, 3.2%].
monitoring_signals: Gasoline prices (AAA) and food price trackers
predictions.rationale: Pipeline inflation is easing and consumer sentiment is fragile; expectations should remain anchored near 3%.

predictions.text: The S&P 500 Index (SPX) will close at or above 5650 on at least one trading day by 2025-10-15 (New York time).
predictions.verification_criteria: Use official S&P DJI or exchange close for SPX. Success if any closing level >= 5650 by 2025-10-15.
monitoring_signals: Mega-cap tech momentum and AI-related earnings/news
Breadth indicators and dealer gamma positioning
predictions.rationale: AI momentum and easing inflation support risk appetite; modest new highs are plausible.

predictions.text: Cboe VIX futures curve will be in backwardation (VX1 settlement > VX2 settlement) for at least 2 consecutive trading days by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify using CFE daily settlements for VX1 and VX2. Success if VX1 settle exceeds VX2 settle for two consecutive trading days before or on 2025-10-31.
monitoring_signals: Spot VIX vs VIX futures term structure
predictions.rationale: Event risk into earnings and geopolitics increases odds of near-term vol spikes vs further-dated.

predictions.text: The U.S. 2-year/10-year Treasury yield spread (FRED: T10Y2Y) will close at or above 0.00% on at least one trading day by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use FRED series T10Y2Y daily close. Success if the value is >= 0.00% on any date through 2025-10-31.
monitoring_signals: Auction demand and bond fund inflows
predictions.rationale: Easing inflation and prospective Fed cuts should steepen the curve, allowing a brief uninversion.

predictions.text: ICE Brent front-month crude futures will settle at or above $96.00 per barrel on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify using ICE settlement for the front-month Brent contract. Success if any official settlement >= $96.00 by 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: Red Sea shipping disruptions and insurance premia
predictions.rationale: Heightened Middle East and maritime risks plus steady demand can push Brent to mid-$90s.

predictions.text: USD/CNH (Yahoo Finance: CNH=X) will close at or above 7.50 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Use Yahoo Finance CNH=X daily close (UTC). Success if the close is >= 7.50 on any day by 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: PBoC daily USD/CNY fix vs estimates
Chinese growth and credit data (TSF, PMIs)
DXY trend and U.S. rates path
predictions.rationale: Growth concerns and policy divergence can pressure the yuan, nudging USD/CNH higher.

predictions.text: Ethereum (ETH-USD) will trade at or above $3,300 on at least one day by 2025-10-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify using CoinMarketCap ETH price (global average) intraday high by 2025-10-31 UTC. Success if any intraday high >= $3,300.
monitoring_signals: Funding rates and perpetual futures basis
predictions.rationale: Risk-on moves around easing inflation and crypto beta could lift ETH to test recent highs.

predictions.text: ICE Endex EU ETS EUA December-2025 futures will settle at or above €67.00 per metric ton at least once by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify using ICE Endex EUA Dec-2025 official settlement prices. Success if any settlement >= €67.00 by 2025-10-31.
monitoring_signals: Policy headlines on EU ETS and MSR
predictions.rationale: Energy market tightness and policy support can lift EU carbon prices toward late-summer highs.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-31, OFAC will announce at least one sanctions designation explicitly naming Hezbollah or Hezbollah-linked individuals/entities via a public press release or sanctions list update.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify via U.S. Treasury press releases or SDN list updates. Success if the text explicitly references Hezbollah or named affiliates by 2025-10-31.
predictions.rationale: Regional escalation raises the likelihood of targeted U.S. sanctions on Hezbollah networks.

predictions.text: The LBMA Silver Price PM will fix at or above $35.00/oz on at least one trading day by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify using LBMA Silver Price PM fix data. Success if any PM fix is >= $35.00/oz by 2025-10-31.
monitoring_signals: Gold price momentum and real yields
predictions.rationale: Falling real yields and strong precious metals sentiment can drive a breakout in silver.
